description: Arcsight TH Kafka, Logger and Vertica Metrics + Node Metrics

targets.query: SELECT LAST("DESTINATION_THROUGHPUT") AS "Destination Throughput" FROM "Z_Conn_2" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$con_th$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(60s), AGENT_NAME, *
SELECT LAST("DESTINATION_THROUGHPUT") AS "Destination Throughput" FROM "Z_Conn_2" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$con_th$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(60s), AGENT_NAME, *
SELECT LAST("DESTINATION_THROUGHPUT") AS "Destination Throughput" FROM "Z_Conn_2" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$con_th$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(60s), AGENT_NAME, *
SELECT LAST("DESTINATION_THROUGHPUT") AS "Destination Throughput" FROM "Z_Conn_2" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$con_th$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(60s), AGENT_NAME, *
SELECT LAST("DESTINATION_THROUGHPUT") AS "Destination Throughput" FROM "Z_Conn_2" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$con_th$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(60s), AGENT_NAME, *
SELECT LAST("DESTINATION_THROUGHPUT") AS "Destination Throughput" FROM "Z_Conn_2" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$con_log$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(60s), AGENT_NAME, *
SELECT LAST("DESTINATION_THROUGHPUT") AS "Destination Throughput" FROM "Z_Conn_2" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$con_log$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(60s), AGENT_NAME, *
SELECT LAST("DESTINATION_THROUGHPUT") AS "Destination Throughput" FROM "Z_Conn_2" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$con_log$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(60s), AGENT_NAME, *
SELECT LAST("DESTINATION_THROUGHPUT") AS "Destination Throughput" FROM "Z_Conn_2" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$con_log$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(60s), AGENT_NAME, *
SELECT LAST("DESTINATION_THROUGHPUT") AS "Destination Throughput" FROM "Z_Conn_2" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$con_log$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(60s), AGENT_NAME, *
SELECT LAST("eps") FROM "tail_eps_esm" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$esm_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s)

panels.description:
This panel shows the default TH topics' EPS.
Use the query "A" as a reference to get the EPS from a non default topic.

targets.query: SELECT LAST("EPS_th-cef") as "th-cef", LAST("EPS_th-arcsight-avro") as "th-arcsight-avro" FROM "exec_Arcsight_TH_KafkaMgr_Topic_Metrics" WHERE "host" =~ /$kafka_manager$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), * fill(none)

SELECT LAST("EPS_th-cef") as "th-cef", LAST("EPS_th-arcsight-avro") as "th-arcsight-avro" FROM "exec_Arcsight_TH_KafkaMgr_Topic_Metrics" WHERE "host" =~ /n15-214-141-h236.arcsight.com/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5s), * fill(none)

panels.title: Topics EPS

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__time(frame_start),
SUM(partition_messages)/(extract(epoch from max(batch_end))-extract(epoch from min(batch_start))) AS EPS
FROM investigation_scheduler.stream_microbatch_history
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(frame_start)
GROUP BY frame_start 
ORDER BY frame_start ASC;

targets.query: SELECT mean("cpu_usage")  / 100 AS "Cores Used", mean("num_threads") AS "Threads", non_negative_derivative(mean("cpu_time_system"), 1s) AS "IO Wait" FROM "procstat_esm" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$esm_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '/opt/arcsight/var/tmp/manager/default/server.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *

panels.description:
This panel shows the consumers' lag.
Use the query "A" as a reference to get a specific consumer's lag.  For now this panel only shows metrics from consumers that DON'T have any space in their names, for example a consumer with the name "consumer_01" is valid but "consumer 01" is not.

targets.query: SELECT LAST("vertica-investigate__LAG__Consuming_From__th-arcsight-avro") as "vertica-investigate Consuming From th-arcsight-avro" FROM "exec_Arcsight_TH_KafkaMgr_Topic_Metrics" WHERE "host" =~ /$kafka_manager$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *

SELECT last("com.arcsight.th.C2A__LAG__Consuming_From__th-cef") as "com.arcsight.th.C2A Consuming From  th-cef" FROM "exec_Arcsight_TH_KafkaMgr_Topic_Metrics" WHERE "host" =~ /$kafka_manager$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *

SELECT last("Logger_Consumer__LAG__Consuming_From__th-cef") as "Logger_Consumer Consuming From  th-cef" FROM "exec_Arcsight_TH_KafkaMgr_Topic_Metrics" WHERE "host" =~ /$kafka_manager$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *

panels.title: Consumers' Lag

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__time(frame_start),
SUM(case when end_reason='END_OF_STREAM' then 1 else 0 end) AS EOS,
SUM(case when end_reason='DEADLINE' then 1 else 0 end) AS DL,
SUM(case when end_reason='NETWORK_ISSUE' then 1 else 0 end) AS NWI 
FROM investigation_scheduler.stream_microbatch_history
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(frame_start)
GROUP BY frame_start 
ORDER BY frame_start ASC;

targets.query: SELECT MEAN("cpu_usage")  / 100 AS "Cores Used", mean("num_threads") AS "Threads", non_negative_derivative(MEAN("cpu_time_iowait"), 1s) AS "IO Wait" FROM "procstat_esm" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$esm_m$/ AND "process_name" = 'mysqld') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter)

SELECT LAST("EPS_th-cef") - LAST("EPS_th-arcsight-avro") as "Events Difference" FROM "exec_Arcsight_TH_KafkaMgr_Topic_Metrics" WHERE "host" =~ /$kafka_manager$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), * fill(none)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    $__time(frame_start),
extract(epoch from frame_start-prev_frame_start) as GAP
from 
(select 
frame_start,
LAG(frame_start,1) over (partition by source_cluster order by frame_start asc) as prev_frame_start
from 
(select 
source_cluster, 
frame_start 
from investigation_scheduler.stream_microbatch_history
) A 
group by source_cluster, frame_start order by frame_start asc
) B 
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(frame_start) 
group by frame_start, gap
order by frame_start asc;

SELECT
  $__time(frame_start),
(extract(epoch from max(batch_end))-extract(epoch from min(batch_start))) AS Duration
FROM investigation_scheduler.stream_microbatch_history
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(frame_start)
GROUP BY frame_start
ORDER BY frame_start ASC;

targets.query: SELECT mean("cpu_usage")  / 100 AS "Cores Used", mean("num_threads") AS "Threads", non_negative_derivative(mean("cpu_time_iowait"), 1s) AS "IO Wait" FROM "procstat_esm" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$esm_m$/ AND "process_name" = 'postmaster') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("cpu_usage")  / 100 AS "Cores Used", mean("num_threads") AS "Threads", non_negative_derivative(mean("cpu_time_iowait"), 1s) AS "IO Wait" FROM "procstat_esm" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$esm_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '/opt/arcsight/esm_monitor_metrics/monitor/postgres_stats_collector_process.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(null)

SELECT mean("cpu_usage")  / 100 AS "Cores Used", mean("num_threads") AS "Threads", non_negative_derivative(mean("cpu_time_iowait"), 1s) AS "IO Wait" FROM "procstat_esm" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$esm_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '/opt/arcsight/esm_monitor_metrics/monitor/postgres_wal_writer_process.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(null)

SELECT mean("cpu_usage")  / 100 AS "Cores Used", mean("num_threads") AS "Threads", non_negative_derivative(mean("cpu_time_iowait"), 1s) AS "IO Wait" FROM "procstat_esm" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$esm_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '/opt/arcsight/esm_monitor_metrics/monitor/postgres_writer_process.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(null)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
a.id,a.microbatch, a.max_parallelism, b.source,b.partitions, c.cluster
FROM
investigation_scheduler.stream_microbatches a , investigation_scheduler.stream_sources b, investigation_scheduler.stream_clusters c
WHERE
a.id=b.id and b.id=c.id;

panels.description: This panel shows the defaults topics' summed recent offsets. Use the query "A" as a reference to get the "Summed Recent Offset"from  a non default topic.

targets.query: SELECT LAST("TO_th-cef") as "th-cef", LAST("TO_th-arcsight-avro") as "th-arcsight-avro" FROM "exec_Arcsight_TH_KafkaMgr_Topic_Metrics" WHERE "host" =~ /$kafka_manager$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)

panels.title: Topics' Summed Recent Offsets

panels.description: To get the information of the th-cef topic size the query needs to be edited by replacing "worker_hostname" with the TH worker hostnames.

targets.query: SELECT SUM("pointer") as "Total th-cef size" FROM (SELECT last("th-cef_Topic_Size") as "pointer" FROM "exec_tests" WHERE "host" =~/^$server_m$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), * fill(none)) GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)

SELECT SUM("pointer") as "Total th-arcsight-avro size" FROM (SELECT last("th-arcsight-avro_Topic_Size") as "pointer" FROM "exec_tests" WHERE "host" =~/^$server_m$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), * fill(none)) GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)

panels.title: Topics Total Size Across All Nodes

panels.description: This panel shows the defaults topics' partitions. Use the query "A" as a reference to get the mentioned metric for a specific topic.

targets.query:
#Example query to get a specific topic partitions:
SELECT Last("TP_CUSTOM_TOPIC") as "CUSTOM_TOPIC" FROM "exec_Arcsight_TH_KafkaMgr_Topic_Metrics" WHERE "host" =~ /$kafka_manager$/  AND $timeFilter

SELECT LAST("TP_th-cef") as "th-cef", LAST("TP_th-binary_esm") as "th-binary_esm", LAST("TP_th-cef-other") as "th-cef-other", LAST("TP_th-syslog") as "th-syslog", LAST("TP_th-arcsight-avro") as "th-arcsight-avro", LAST("TP___consumer_offsets") as "__consumer_offsets", LAST("TP__schemas") as "_schemas", LAST("TP_th-arcsight-avro-sp_metrics") as "th-arcsight-avro-sp_metrics", LAST("TP_th-arcsight-json-datastore") as "th-arcsight-json-datastore" FROM "exec_Arcsight_TH_KafkaMgr_Topic_Metrics" WHERE "host" =~ /$kafka_manager$/  AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Topics' Partitions

targets.query: select last("n_cpus") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /$server_m$/)

SELECT mean(usage_user) as "user", mean(usage_system) as "system", mean(usage_softirq) as "softirq", mean(usage_steal) as "steal", mean(usage_nice) as "nice", mean(usage_irq) as "irq", mean(usage_iowait) as "iowait", mean(usage_guest) as "guest", mean(usage_guest_nice) as "guest_nice"  FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$server_m$/ and cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *
SELECT mean("usage_user") + mean(usage_system) + mean(usage_iowait) FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server_m$/ AND "cpu" != 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "cpu" fill(none)
SELECT mean("usage_user") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server_m$/ AND "cpu" != 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "cpu" fill(none)
SELECT mean("usage_system") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server_m$/ AND "cpu" != 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "cpu" fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server_m$/ AND "cpu" != 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "cpu" fill(null)
SELECT mean(load1) as load_1,mean(load5) as load_5,mean(load15) as load_15 FROM "system" WHERE host =~ /$server_m$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *

SELECT ( MEAN(load1) / [[n_cpus]] ) as load_1, ( MEAN(load5) / [[n_cpus]] ) as load_5, ( MEAN(load15) / [[n_cpus]] ) as load_15 FROM "system" WHERE host =~ /$server_m$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *

SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(used) as used, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /$server_m$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s)*8 as "Inbound"  FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server_m$/ AND interface =~ /$nic/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_sent),1s)*8 as "Outbound" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server_m$/ AND interface =~ /$nic/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(reads),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server_m$/ AND "name" =~ /$disks$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(writes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server_m$/ AND "name" =~ /$disks$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_time),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server_m$/ AND "name" =~ /$disks$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_time),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server_m$/ AND "name" =~ /$disks$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_bytes),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server_m$/ AND "name" =~ /$disks$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_bytes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server_m$/ AND "name" =~ /$disks$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), * fill(none)
SELECT mean(total) AS "total", mean(used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$server_m$/ AND "path" =~ /^$mountpoint$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "path" fill(none)
SELECT mean("used_percent") AS "used_percent" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$server_m$/ AND "path" =~ /^$mountpoint$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "path"
